policies.involuntary_refund: Process the refund in the GDS, no waiver is required, add ENDO BOX as (INVL RFD MK123/25JUN CNXL)
policies.involuntary_reissue:
If connection does not match the arrival on the long haul and ticket already issued:
- Option 1: Rebook/Reissue on INVOL basis on the next available flight same day, same airline, same RBD or lowest available fare in same cabin
- Option 2: Rebook/Reissue on INVOL basis on the next available flight next day, same airline, same RBD or lowest available fare in same cabin
MANDATORY: Insert both canceled and rebooked flight details in the ENDO box to avoid ADMs
policies.voluntary_refund: Proceed as per fare rules associated with the ticket
policies.medical_refund: Proceed as per fare rules associated with the ticket
policies.name_change:
1. Name change permitted for spelling/typing errors
2. Married/Maiden name mismatch – proof is required
3. Inverse of first name and surname
PROCEDURE:
- Step 1: Rebook in same cabin and RBD if possible, or rebook in available classes under correct name
- Step 2: Reissue original ticket under corrected name, collect ADC if any, and apply $25 name change fee
Restrictions:
- No passenger substitution. No name change allowed.
- EMDs not permitted for name changes
- Not allowed on codeshares (e.g., MK/EK, MK/AF)
policies.group_booking:
- A group booking requires a minimum of 10 adults on the same flight
- Benefits include:
  - Preferential group fares
  - Dedicated sales support
  - Name changes permitted before ticket issuance
  - Meal requests allowed (≥48 hours prior to departure)
- Children and infants are not counted in the group minimum
policies.infant_policy: - Infant is defined as a passenger under 12 months
policies.seat_request_policy:
Assign seats thru the GDS.
Chargeable seats should be collected thru EMD via the GDS.
policies.short_term_cancellation_policy:
- A full refund is available if the ticket is canceled within 24 hours of booking, provided the flight is at least 7 days away at the time of booking
- After this 24-hour window, cancellation policies and any applicable fees depend on the fare rules of the ticket.

involuntary_reissue_code: INV REISSUE MK # of the canceled flight + the # of the new flight.
Cancelled + new rebooked flights must be listed in ENDO (no fixed format)
